teams.name: Armenia
teams.loan_because: we want to be part of a global community that aims to sustainably alleviate poverty
teams.description:
The Armenia Team currently has 90 members supporting Armenian entrepreneurs. 

Whether they make cheese, herd sheep, sell shoes, or grow tomatoes, our team exists to support them in getting access to affordable loans all over Armenia.
 
Past and Present Kiva Fellows Serving in Armenia:

- Velizara Passajova KF8
- Brian Kelly KF9
- Suzanne Till KF9
- Alexis Ohanian KF10
- Liz Nagle KF10
- Peter Tashjian KF11
- Vanick Der Bedrossian KF12
- Abhishek Banerjee KF13
- Caree Edson KF14

As Kiva Fellows, we are here to support Kiva lending in Armenia. We will update team members with interesting news, and gladly answer any questions you may have.

Happy lending, and Go Team Armenia!

You can check out our field partners:
SEF International here: http://www.kiva.org/partners/169
and Nor Horizon here:
http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=146&_tpg=fb

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Geocachers help Kiva
teams.loan_because:
Gleiche Chancen für alle!
Ist bei uns in einem sozialen Staat selbstverständlich.  Aber leider nicht auf der ganzen Welt.
Das Ziel soll sein das man den Menschen die Möglichkeit gibt mit einem Kleinkredit eine neue Existenz aufzubauen.
Doch die Organisation KIVA und ihnen kann man die Möglichkeit geben den Menschen auf eine einfache Art zu helfen. Ab einem Darlehen von $ 25 kann man so viele Menschen helfen die sonst keinen Kredit erhalten würden. Umso mehr Leute mitmachen desto mehr kann man in der ganzen Welt helfen.
Ich würde mich freuen wenn auch Ihr euch in meiner Gruppe bei KIVA anschliesst.
http://www.kiva.org/team/Chancen
teams.description:
Equal opportunities for all!
Of course, is with us in a social state. But unfortunately not all over the world.
The goal should be the one giving people the opportunity with a small loan to build a new life.
But the organization KIVA and they can give people the opportunity to a simple way to help. From a loan of $ 25 can help so many people that otherwise would receive no credit. The more people can join the more you help around the world.
I would be glad if your connects you in my group at KIVA.
http://www.kiva.org/team/Chancen

Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: Culture Detox
teams.loan_because: we are grateful for the many privileges we enjoy in North America and want to empower the working poor to better their material circumstances and the communities they live in. Culture Detox is about consciously choosing to reject this ideology; to give instead of spending.  It is about recognizing that using our resources to help the poor is one of the things Jesus would have us do on this earth.

teams.name: Catalunya amb Kiva
teams.loan_because: We believe in helping other people. We do not only want Catalunya to be a better place for its citizens, but we want the whole world to be a better place for everyone.
teams.description: Catalunya is a small region in south Europe. We want our culture to be acknowledged all over the world... and we want to stand up and make this world a better place. We believe that Kiva is a good starting point. We believe in Kiva! We, the citizens of Catalonia, want to be committed with everyone. Our language is Catalan. We love Gaudi and his Sagrada Família. We like Miró, Dalí, and Tapies paintings. We listen to Pau Casals, Isaac Albéniz, and Enrique Granados. We build up Castellers, an extraordinary example of what human collaboration can achieve. We dance Sardanes and sing Habaneres. We eat Calçots, Paella, Escudella, Allioli, Panellets, Crema Catalana, Mato, and pa amb tomàquet. La Costa Brava, la Costa Daurada, l'Empordà, els Pirineus... all of them are beautiful places from Catalunya. We live by the Mediterranean sea. We like sports (Barça and Espanyol are two good examples). We believe in people, and thus we like to see how Sagrada Família is being built thanks to the backing of many people. We are ruled by the Generalitat and we drink from the Muga, Fluvià, Ter, Ebre, Llobregat, Besos, Anoia, Segre, Noguera, and we like hiking in Collserola, Tibidabo, Montjuïc, Montserrat, la Pica d'Estats. We ride at Montmelo F1 circuit, we produce Cava and wine in serveral areas (Montsant, Vallès, Alella, Conca de Barbera, Costers del Segre, Emporda, Penedes, Pla de Bages, Priorat i la Terra Alta). We are proud of our land and culture. Everyone is welcome to our home. We live in one of the best places of the world. Let's make the rest of them great too!

Il regroupe des professionnels de la communication (agences, indépendants) et des particuliers qui souhaitent contribuer à changer le cours des choses en permettant à des personnes de vivre dignement du fruit de leur travail, partout dans le monde.

Welcome !
--
Cette équipe est ouverte à tous. Kathleen  (25 dec. 1959 - 16 fév. 2011) avait visité de nombreux pays et parlait plusieurs langues, du français au russe.
Après avoir quitté les USA elle s'était installée à Paris depuis près de 15 ans.
Elle était une excellente chercheuse en Biologie, et participait à la lutte contre le cancer.
Si vous connaissez des gens atteint par cette maladie, ou souffrant d'une méningite carcinomateuse, cette équipe est pour vous : internationale, ouverte et amicale.

teams.name: 101 Ways Your Kid$ Can Make Money
teams.loan_because:
We believe:

1. We LEARN

2. We EARN

3. We RETURN
teams.description:
"101 Ways Your Kid$ Can Make Money", The Secrets About Money That You Don't Learn in School a 10-CD Educational Audio Program.

A portion of the proceeds from each sale will be tithed through Kiva for the sake of alleviating poverty across this beautiful planet.

"101 Ways Your Kid$ Can Make Money" is a real-world study of amazing young entrepreneurs from ages 6-18 who acted on an idea and are now earning a few dollars to thousands of dollars every month.

These kids will teach YOU how to act on an opportunity and fill a need to create a viable. profit-making business.

At school, your children learn many valuable concepts, yet they are rarely taught anything about finances and how to set up a business that could pay for their tuition of their college or university education.

Schools teach children how to work hard for money. Are you ready to teach your kids how to have money work hard for them and not be dependent on a pension, the government or someone else to take care of them later in life?

Give your children the financial head start necessary to thrive in today's fast paced and changing world.

"I will recommend this program to every kid I can. It is the up and coming kids who are our future leaders and entrepreneurs."
- Bill Bartmann, National Entrepreneur of the Year, http://www.BillBartmann.com

"This is the perfect resource for any kid who wants to ignite their entrepreneurial spirit."
- Lu An Mitchell, Canada's #1 Female Entrepreneur, Motivational Speaker & Philanthropist, 
http://www.LuAnMitchell.com

“It’s about time we had a curriculum to teach children real-life skills so every  child can grow up feeling confident and secure about finances. Darren Jacklin has created a program that should be in every school.”
-Dr. Brenda Wade, “America’s Love Doctor,” psychologist, author, speaker and founder of the International Love & Money Summit
http://www.DocWade.com

teams.name: CPAlead
teams.loan_because:
We know how far the US dollar can go when it comes to helping 3rd world countries, we have seen the results in some of our very own clients.  

Our clients come from all over the world looking for non-traditional ways to earn money from their website.  

Every week we hear stories from our clients now having enough money to help ailing loved ones pay their hospital bills, to those who now help others in their community that they see struggling every day.  

We loan because we are in a fortunate position to give others a once in a lifetime opportunity to start their business, in hopes that they will some day help others the same way we helped them.
teams.description:
We are an innovative Internet advertising network that was built from the bottom up in 2006 and have since grown to 100,000 clients from all over the world.  

We welcome anyone with an entrepreneurial spirit and a website to join our network and our growing affiliate community.

teams.name: Andreaskyrkan i Helsingfors

“Nej, detta är den fasta jag vill ha: Lossa orättfärdiga bojor, lös okets band, släpp de förtryckta fria, bryt sönder alla ok, ja, dela ditt bröd åt den hungrige skaffa de fattiga och hemlösa en boning, kläd den nakne var du än ser honom och drag dig inte undan för den som är ditt kött och blod.” Jes 58: 6-7 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Jesus säger: “Amen säger jag er: Allt vad ni har gjort för en av dessa mina minsta bröder, det har ni gjort mot mig.” Matt 25: 40 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Is not this the kind of fasting I have chosen: to loose the chains of injustice and untie the cords of the yoke, to set the oppressed free and break every yoke? 
Is it not to share your food with the hungry and to provide the poor wanderer with shelter— when you see the naked, to clothe him, and not to turn away from your own flesh and blood?” Isaiah 58: 6-7 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Jesus says: “I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.” Matt 25: 40
teams.description: Andreaskyrkan är en frikyrka i Helsingfors och hör till samfundet Missionskyrkan i Finland. teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

teams.name: Team Minneapolis/St. Paul
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the lives of those in need.
teams.description: We are a team of Twin Cities residents concerned about world poverty. We host events around the city to raise money for Kiva loans, which we use to make new loans once the money is returned. We hope, as a community, to improve the plight of the impoverished by using microlending.
